Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Educational | Family | How To/Do It Yourself
Status: Returning Series
Network: History Channel ( USA)
Airs: Wednesdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: December 09, 2011
Episode Order: 8

It is often the common man inventing his dream that has changed history. "INVENTION USA" focuses on Reichart Von Wolfshield and Garrett Lisi, two brilliant tech and science experts who travel America, devoted to finding the next great thing in the haystack of prototypes presented to them by amateur inventors.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-29969)
